results.title: Homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia with generalized arterial disease.

results.title: A matter of life and death? The Heart Protection Study and protection of clinical trial participants.
results.text_hl: The Heart Protection Study is one such trial, and it showed significant mortality reduction following 5 years of treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ compared with placebo in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Arterial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002539 @@@arterial disease@@@ and/or @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Migrino RQ, Topol EJ, Heart Protection Study. A matter of life and death? The Heart Protection Study and protection of clinical trial participants. Control Clin Trials. 2003 Oct;24(5):501-5. PMID: 14500049
citations.BibTeX: @article{14500049, title={A matter of life and death? The Heart Protection Study and protection of clinical trial participants.}, author={Migrino RQ and Topol EJ and Heart Protection Study}, journal={Control Clin Trials}, volume={24}, number={5}, pages={501-5}}

results.title: MRC/BHF Heart Protection Study of cholesterol lowering with simvastatin in 20,536 high-risk individuals: a randomised placebo-controlled trial.
results.text_hl: METHODS: 20,536 UK adults (aged 40-80 years) with @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary disease@@@, other @DISEASE_Arterial_Occlusive_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001157 @@@occlusive@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Arterial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002539 @@@arterial disease@@@, or @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ were randomly allocated to receive 40 mg @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ daily (average compliance: 85%) or matching placebo (average non-study statin use: 17%).

citations.NLM: Heart Protection Study Collaborative Group. MRC/BHF Heart Protection Study of cholesterol lowering with simvastatin in 20,536 high-risk individuals: a randomised placebo-controlled trial. Lancet. 2002 Jul 6;360(9326):7-22. PMID: 12114036
citations.BibTeX: @article{12114036, title={MRC/BHF Heart Protection Study of cholesterol lowering with simvastatin in 20,536 high-risk individuals: a randomised placebo-controlled trial.}, author={Heart Protection Study Collaborative Group}, journal={Lancet}, volume={360}, number={9326}, pages={7-22}}
